label: Take a picture of the car from the front
Take a picture of the car from the passenger side
Take a picture of the car from behind
Take a picture of the car from the driver side
Take pictures of damage
description: Take pictures of damage, if any, to the car (scratches, dents, cracks and chips in the windows).

label: Load the car on a tow truck
Make sure that the car is securely fastened
description:
Check that all wheels of the vehicle are securely fastened with straps and that the straps are undamaged.
 Check that there are no parts on the vehicle that could be lost during towing.
